ja456:1.4: Gantabbamāhu → gantabyamāhu (mr) | dvipadindaseṭṭha → dipadānaseṭṭha (bj, pts-vp-pli1); dvipadānaseṭṭha (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja456:5.4: ca kho → pubbeva kho (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
ja456:8.2: Sārāṇiyaṁ → sāraṇīyaṁ (mr) | vītisārayimha → vītisārimha (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja456:10.1: Bālāva → bālā ca (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
